result.title: Invitation to 24 Hours of Code
result.content:
Hello Coders!
Greetings from Codebuddy !!!!

With the rain turning from tapping on the window to pitter-patter, people running for cover outside as the clouds spat out their beads of water. With the first showers of monsoon we bring to you the exciting challenge of the second edition of 24 HOURS OF CODE. So put on your thinking cap to solve a great variety of problems and test your programming skills in a 24 hour rollicking contest.

Contest Link: — https://codebuddy.co.in/contests/24HOCR2
Time:- 19th June 2017 08:00PM IST – 20th June 2017 :8:00PM IST

So, mark your calendars for another exciting contest. We hope to see you all on the leaderboard.

Like our page for further updates : CodeBuddy

Team CodeBuddy
